text: They are two of the top models in the world known for rocking edgy couture on the runway. Bella opted for comfort on Monday night in Manhattan as she stepped out in rather casual clothing for a pre - birthday celebration just ahead of her 22nd birthday while accompanied by her 23 - year - old sister.
